definition: to dwindle/to vanish/to make vanish/to exercise restraint/to curb (one's mirth, arrogance etc)/to astringe/(math.) to converge
to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to hold back/to restrain/to control (oneself)/to collect/Taiwan pr. [lian4]
to draw in one's claws/to show some modesty

sentences.english: It is shown that the SOR method is convergent if the over relaxation parameter is properly chosen.
sentences.chinese: 證明了在適當的選取松馳因子，SOR方法是收斂的。

sentences.english: Thus man restrains himself from the evil doings and does good things.
sentences.chinese: 人於是就收斂起自己惡的一面，於是就積善行德。

sentences.english: This paper discusses a class of degenerate linear parabolic differential inequations.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了一類拋物型變分不等式的近似收斂問題。

sentences.english: Helpful in the treatment of diarrhea due to its astringent properties.
sentences.chinese: 有用在腹瀉的治療由於它的收斂性物產。

sentences.english: They're often tasted dry instead of being acidic, with good structured and restrained personality.
sentences.chinese: 口感通常較幹但不會過酸，酒體結構出色，風格收斂。

sentences.english: We obtain an upper bounded estimate for the convergence rate of the piecewise linear interpolation.
sentences.chinese: 給出了分段線性插值收斂速度的一種估計。

sentences.english: Our method Possesses global convergence under nondegenerate assumption.
sentences.chinese: 在非退化假設下，本文算法具有全局收斂性。

sentences.english: The key problem is how to increase the convergent speed of adaptive iteration algorithm.
sentences.chinese: 這裏重要的是如何提高解自適應疊代方程的收斂速度。

sentences.english: Aim To research the algorithm for solving nondifferentiable programming.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究求解不可微優化問題的算法及收斂性。

sentences.english: The actual proof of convergence is generally not trivial.
sentences.chinese: 並在通常條件下證明了方法的全局收斂性。

sentences.english: At the same time, the convergence is proven for solving 4-order plate bending problem.
sentences.chinese: 證明了該單元對薄板彎曲問題的收斂性。

sentences.english: Wide ovals and sleek cat-eye styles work to diminish fullness.
sentences.chinese: 寬橢圓形和圓滑的貓眼款可以起到收斂圓臉的效果。

sentences.english: The method has good preciseness and less unknown variables and it is convenient to be used in practice.
sentences.chinese: 該方法收斂性較好，未知量少，便於實際應用。

sentences.english: Results Convergence of the method under certain conditions is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 結果在一定的條件下，收斂性得到了保證。

sentences.english: The relationship between the order M of the exponential series function and astringency was also analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了冪數級函數階數M與其收斂性的關係。

sentences.english: For extraction of real roots of an equation, an iteration method with large scope convergence is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出求方程實根的一種大範圍收斂的迭代方法。

definition: to ease (tension)/to alleviate/to moderate/to allay/to make more mild
to sense/to perceive/to become aware of/to detect
